channel.title: Torva, Virtus & Pernix NOW HERE!

Models and Ints : http://www.mediafire.com/?7qh1pnlbdw49ydd
I Have'nt maked them , i just put them here.
Stats :

item.title: Torva, Virtus & Pernix NOW HERE!
item.dc:creator: @24man30 24man30
item.description:
@24man30 wrote:

My client wont load them, and I am using delta. I Gzipped them and put them in models folder. They wont load. Im just testing to see if they load. These wont load either.

MediaFire

rxmodels.rar

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Torva, Virtus & Pernix NOW HERE!
item.dc:creator: @xxnickownsxx xxnickownsxx
item.description:
@xxnickownsxx wrote:

Alright i can umm, change all the ints to work correctly but where do i put the dat files… I first made a new folder called models… When i added the model for Torva full helm. It worked! Then it crashed my client. Couldn’t log in that account after that :… Then i tried to stick it in a folder called raw :\ what am i doing wrong :\ Here look at this…

case 14998:
itemDef.name = “Torva Full Helm”;
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Equip”
itemDef.modelID = 62714;
itemDef.modelZoom = 672;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 85;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1867;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 62738;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 62754;
itemDef.description = “A Very Powerful Armour.”.getBytes();
break;

There were some things i left out of the original ints cause i was afraid of failing. If it is failing due to the lack of things i have in that code please tell me

Read full topic

i had the same problem just look at the other item cases and how they are done and change torva and whatever to those like my torva is this:
case 20143:
itemDef.modelid = 62701;
itemDef.name = “Torva platelegs”;
itemDef.description = “Torva platelegs”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1740;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 474;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 2045;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -5;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62743;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62760;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Check-charges”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;
[/quote]

This should be in server help you failure.

Thanks for releasing these, but get rid of the ints for these noobs! Getting pissed at all the morons that think they can own a server when they don’t even know what the hell a string or integer is. It’s like my friend trying to learn C++ without knowing what a character is.[/quote]This would go in model requests/help not server help

and the older pi clients dont use the 197 200 int it uses maleEquip1 and such.

Read full topic

item.title: Torva, Virtus & Pernix NOW HERE!

item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“dutchboy, post:5, topic:386000”]why is no1 flaming?
Isn’t every1 supposed to say leeched from rs, gtfo fag, die in hell, go make ur own models?[/quote]
No one is doing that because he stated they weren’t his and most people request these. Welcome to MoparScape, here we know how to read, maybe you should start learning.

i had the same problem just look at the other item cases and how they are done and change torva and whatever to those like my torva is this:
case 20143:
itemDef.modelid = 62701;
itemDef.name = “Torva platelegs”;
itemDef.description = “Torva platelegs”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1740;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 474;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 2045;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -5;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62743;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62760;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[2] = “Check-charges”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;
